data.text: @AIllmatic Hello! If your flight was booked via the travel agency, to request other flight alternatives or refund, you will need to get in touch with the agency: https://t.co/60qQfk73Uf
@Touley7 Hello! Please DM us privately your booking reference number as well as more details about your reservation, we will check.

@yourbakaloli Hello! For currently planned flight schedule we kindly invite you to check our webpage https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg! Please be reminded that there still might be some adjustments because of the imposed restrictions. Thank you.

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text:
Thank you for voting! Almost all of you answered correct - the new name of our Economy class ticket types is GREEN! 💚
We wish you a pleasant evening! 👋
https://t.co/s9aDVv9KKj
@inanime Hello! To check the most latest status, we kindly invite you to contact our Reservations department, our colleagues will advise: https://t.co/9ZLiOgN2eR

urls.title: Frequently asked question about airBaltic
urls.description: We're here to help you! Helpful answers to your questions and useful contacts to find out everything you need about your flight.
